1: דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>The word</n> יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הוֹשֵׁ֙עַ֙ <sup>1954 </sup> <n>that came unto Hosea</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> בְּאֵרִ֔י <sup>882 </sup> <n>of Beeri</n> בִּימֵ֨י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the days</n> עֻזִּיָּ֥ה <sup>5818 </sup> <n>of Uzziah</n> יוֹתָ֛ם <sup>3147 </sup> <n>Jotham</n> אָחָ֥ז <sup>271 </sup> <n>Ahaz</n> יְחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <sup>2396 </sup> <n>Hezekiah</n> מַלְכֵ֣י <sup>4428 </sup> <n>kings</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וּבִימֵ֛י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>and in the days</n> יָרָבְעָ֥ם <sup>3379 </sup> <n>of Jeroboam</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יוֹאָ֖שׁ <sup>3101 </sup> <n>of Joash</n> מֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
2: תְּחִלַּ֥ת <sup>8462 </sup> <n>The beginning</n> דִּבֶּר־ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>of the word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> בְּהוֹשֵׁ֑עַ <sup>1954 </sup> <n>by Hosea</n> פ וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הוֹשֵׁ֗עַ <sup>1954 </sup> <n>to Hosea</n> לֵ֣ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Go</n> קַח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>take</n> לְךָ֞ אֵ֤שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>unto thee a wife</n> זְנוּנִים֙ <sup>2183 </sup> <n>of whoredoms</n> וְיַלְדֵ֣י <sup>3206 </sup> <n>and children</n> זְנוּנִ֔ים <sup>2183 </sup> <n>of whoredoms</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> זָנֹ֤ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>hath committed great</n> תִזְנֶה֙ <sup>2181 </sup> <n>whoredom</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>for the land</n> מֵֽאַחֲרֵ֖י <sup>310 </sup> <n>[departing] from</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
3: וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> וַיִּקַּ֔ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גֹּ֖מֶר <sup>1586 </sup> <n>Gomer</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>the daughter</n> דִּבְלָ֑יִם <sup>1691 </sup> <n>of Diblaim</n> וַתַּ֥הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>which conceived</n> וַתֵּֽלֶד־ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and bare</n> ל֖וֹ בֵּֽן׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>him a son</n>
4: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֵלָ֔יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>unto</n> קְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>unto him Call</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> יִזְרְעֶ֑אל <sup>3157 </sup> <n>Jezreel</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ע֣וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>yet</n> מְעַ֗ט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>for yet a little</n> וּפָ֨קַדְתִּ֜י <sup>6485 </sup> <n>[while] and I will avenge</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דְּמֵ֤י <sup>1818 </sup> <n>the blood</n> יִזְרְעֶאל֙ <sup>3157 </sup> <n>of Jezreel</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>upon the house</n> יֵה֔וּא <sup>3058 </sup> <n>of Jehu</n> וְהִ֨שְׁבַּתִּ֔י <sup>7673 </sup> <n>and will cause to cease</n> מַמְלְכ֖וּת <sup>4468 </sup> <n>the kingdom</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
5: וְהָיָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass at that day</n> הַה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>I</n> וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּי֙ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>that I will break</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> קֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>the bow</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> בְּעֵ֖מֶק <sup>6010 </sup> <n>in the valley</n> יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <sup>3157 </sup> <n>of Jezreel</n>
6: וַתַּ֤הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>And she conceived again</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> וַתֵּ֣לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and bare</n> בַּ֔ת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>a daughter</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And [God] said</n> ל֔וֹ קְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>unto him Call</n> שְׁמָ֖הּ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>her name</n> לֹ֣א רֻחָ֑מָה <sup>3819 </sup> <n>Loruhamah</n> כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> אוֹסִ֜יף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>for I will no more</n> ע֗וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> אֲרַחֵם֙ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>have mercy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֣ית יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>would</n> נָשֹׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>but I will utterly</n> אֶשָּׂ֖א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>take them away</n> לָהֶֽם׃
7: וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֤ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>upon the house</n> יְהוּדָה֙ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> אֲרַחֵ֔ם <sup>7355 </sup> <n>But I will have mercy</n> וְהֽוֹשַׁעְתִּ֖ים <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and will save</n> בַּיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>them by the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their God</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and will not</n> אֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֗ם <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and will not save</n> בְּקֶ֤שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>them by bow</n> וּבְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>nor by sword</n> וּבְמִלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>nor by battle</n> בְּסוּסִ֖ים <sup>5483 </sup> <n>by horses</n> וּבְפָרָשִֽׁים׃ <sup>6571 </sup> <n>nor by horsemen</n>
8: וַתִּגְמֹ֖ל <sup>1580 </sup> <n>Now when she had weaned</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לֹ֣א רֻחָ֑מָה <sup>3819 </sup> <n>Loruhamah</n> וַתַּ֖הַר <sup>2029 </sup> <n>she conceived</n> וַתֵּ֥לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and bare</n> בֵּֽן׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n>
9: וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then said</n> קְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>[God] Call</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> לֹ֣א עַמִּ֑י <sup>3818 </sup> <n>Loammi</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אַתֶּם֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> עַמִּ֔י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>for ye [are] not my people</n> וְאָנֹכִ֖י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָכֶֽם׃ ס
10: וְֽ֠הָיָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מִסְפַּ֤ר <sup>4557 </sup> <n>Yet the number</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כְּח֣וֹל <sup>2344 </sup> <n>shall be as the sand</n> הַיָּ֔ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Which</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יִמַּ֖ד <sup>4058 </sup> <n>which cannot be measured</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יִסָּפֵ֑ר <sup>5608 </sup> <n>nor numbered</n> וְֽ֠הָיָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בִּמְק֞וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>and it shall come to pass [that] in the place</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Where</n> יֵאָמֵ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>where it was said</n> לָהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> עַמִּ֣י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto them Ye [are] not my people</n> אַתֶּ֔ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>It</n> יֵאָמֵ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>[there] it shall be said</n> לָהֶ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>to them</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto them [Ye are] the sons</n> אֵֽל־ <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> חָֽי׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of the living</n>
11: וְ֠נִקְבְּצוּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>be gathered</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Then shall the children</n> יְהוּדָ֤ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וּבְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> יַחְדָּ֔ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> וְשָׂמ֥וּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and appoint</n> לָהֶ֛ם רֹ֥אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>head</n> אֶחָ֖ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>themselves one</n> וְעָל֣וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and they shall come up</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> גָד֖וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>for great</n> י֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[shall be] the day</n> יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <sup>3157 </sup> <n>of Jezreel</n>
